byline.original: By ERIC DASH and PETER LATTMAN

snippet: In separate suits, New York’s attorney general and the United States attorney in Manhattan say the bank it overcharged customers almost $2 billion in foreign transactions.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Bank of New York Mellon Corp

lead_paragraph: In separate suits, New York’s attorney general and the United States attorney in Manhattan say the bank it overcharged customers almost $2 billion in foreign transactions.

headline.main: U.S. and New York Sue Bank of New York Mellon Over Foreign Exchange Fees
